caramel.api.objects

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • caramel.api.objects.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Render, Update

    public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements Update, Render
    This Scene represents a collection of GameObjects.
